Extract adjacency matrix from a DAG skeleton.

Source: R/network.R
compute_adjacency_matrix.Rd

Is generally a wrapper around calls to igraph::as_adjacency_matrix() and igraph::graph_from_graphnel(). Transforms from a GraphNEL object in igraph.

compute_adjacency_matrix(dag_skeleton)

Arguments

dag_skeleton

The PC DAG skeleton object.

Value

Outputs an adjacency matrix of the DAG skeleton.

Contents

Developed by Luke Johnston, Clemens Wittenbecher.
